roleset.name: to value highly, appreciate
roleset.note: PRIZE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'prize' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from prize.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: passive
example.text: Finally , [*-1] flouting the BPCA 's wishes [*]to continue [the popular two-mile riverside Esplanade]-1 , prized [*] -1 for its expansive views of New York Harbor , the Statue of Liberty and Ellis Island , Ms. Bartlett threw up yet another wall , this time concrete , this time 10 1\/2 feet tall .
example.arg: for its expansive views of New York Harbor , the Statue of Liberty and Ellis Island

example.name: all args
example.text: Mary prizes John for his sunny mood and ability to heal quickly.
example.arg: for his sunny mood and ability to heal quickly
